title: Warwicks Q teleportation bug...
body:
Warwicks Q in some circumstances gives him a free "flash" (watch attached video).

1. Use Q on a champion that is "in air", for example use plant that allows bounce trough the wall
2. Warwick will be dragged with his opponent if he used Q on him in the same time

I've seen this bug few times in the past but I was convinced that is was already fixed. 
As you can see on attached video, it still occurs, very annoying...

replies.body: This is warwick's lock on mechanic with his Q. It is working as intended.

I know that what is represented in this video is not a bug, but being a warwick main I have noticed a bug with his Q. Sometimes when you hold it down it attaches but doesn't bring you behind them, I don't know how to replicate it and it only happens maybe less than 1 in 20 matches, but is this something that you know about/can fix?

Thanks for a quick response. Honestly, I'm not convinced to this solution. It's kinda weird that he can lock on a champion and dash trough the walls or forest... but anyway, it's not my decision how this should work. Hope it's going to be changed somewhere in the future.
